title: Wide-Field Astronomy and e-Science at Edinburgh
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: The impact is primarily scientific (used by thousands of scientists). However, we have had exploratory discussions with other disciplines.  Cultural
findingsText: Brief report on historical grant. We developed very large astronomical data archives for several key sky surveys, along with public interfaces for access and analysis of data, and key new technology developments. The archives constructed are used by several thousand astronomers worldwide to aid their own research. We have had discussions with database technologists and other scientific disciplines with related needs. Digital/Communication/Information Technologies (including Software)
